short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reminds you to take screen breaks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Give your eyes a break with Screen Break Reminder! This Chrome extension helps you maintain eye health and reduce screen fatigue by reminding you to step away from your screen at regular intervals.

Features:

- Customizable Break Intervals: Set reminders every 20, 30, or 60 minutes, or customize to any interval that suits your needs.

- Gentle Notifications: Get friendly pop-up notifications to remind you when it's time for a break. Each reminder encourages you to look at something 20 feet away for 20 seconds.

How It Works:

1. Choose a preset interval or set a custom time.
2. Start the timer, and receive a notification when itâ€™s time to take a break.

Follow the 20-20-20 rule to give your eyes a quick rest: look at something 20 feet away for 20 seconds.

Take a few moments to relax and refocus with Screen Break Reminder. Great for students, professionals, or anyone who spends long hours at the computer.
